text:
Munenori Kawasaki (川﨑 宗則, Kawasaki Munenori) (born June 3, 1981) is former a Japanese baseball player. He last played for the Wei Chuan Dragons in 2019.
He has also played for the Fukuoka SoftBank Hawks of Nippon Professional Baseball, from 2001 to 2011. He also played for the Seattle Mariners, and the Toronto Blue Jays. He also played for the Japanese national baseball team in the 2008 Summer Olympics and both the 2006 and 2009 World Baseball Classics.
